articles.description: It's a pretty big mental stretch to imagine the good-hearted, iconic hero Captain America as a total psychopath, but The Russo Brothers and actor Chris Evans are taking a crack at the notion in their upcoming film, The Gray Man.
articles.content: It's a pretty big mental stretch to imagine the good-hearted, iconic hero Captain America as a total psychopath, but The Russo Brothers and actor Chris Evans are taking a crack at the notion in their… [+1989 chars]

articles.author: Milly Veitch
articles.title: Loose Women discuss Jamal Edwards after it was revealed he died after taking 'recreational drugs' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Brenda Edwards said she has been left in a state of shock after learning the cause of her only son's death four months ago - but wanted his passing to 'help drive conversation'.
articles.content:
The Loose Women panel got choked up on Tuesday as Ruth Langsford read out Brenda Edwards' statement that revealed her son Jamal had died from a sudden heart attack after taking drugs.
